name: rock-polish
effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.
